languages.text: "Великий благослови и вас, и весь ваш род!" {n}Джай молниеносно вытаскивает из-за пазухи {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g} и демонстрирует вам схему Футфола.{/n} "Значит, вот как поступим. Не стоит, чтобы нас видели вместе до того, как мы доберемся до схрона. Я отправлюсь на место первой — своими путями, я знаю тропки".

traits.locale_text: "Великий благослови и вас, и весь ваш род!" {n}Джай молниеносно вытаскивает из-за пазухи инфопластину и демонстрирует вам схему Футфола.{/n} "Значит, вот как поступим. Не стоит, чтобы нас видели вместе до того, как мы доберемся до схрона. Я отправлюсь на место первой".

languages.text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."
languages.original_text: "Великий благослови и вас, и весь ваш род!" {n}Джай молниеносно вытаскивает из-за пазухи {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g} и демонстрирует вам схему Футфола.{/n} "Значит, вот как поступим. Не стоит, чтобы нас видели вместе до того, как мы доберемся до схрона. Я отправлюсь на место первой — своими путями, я знаю тропки".

traits.locale_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a data-slate and shows you a layout of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first."

"May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a data-slate and shows you a layout of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first."

"May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a data-slate and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first."

"May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a data-slate and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first."

"May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

languages.text: 「ああ、エグザルテッド・ワンの祝福があなたの家系にありますように！」 {n}ジェイは即座に{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}を取り出し、フットフォールの地図を見せてきた。{/n}「なら、こうしない？隠れ家にたどり着くまでは、一緒にいるところを見られないほうが無難だから、あたしが先に現地に行く。誰にも目撃されないように、あたししか知らないルートで行くよ」
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、エグザルテッド・ワンの祝福があなたの家系にありますように！」 {n}ジェイは即座に{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}を取り出し、フットフォールの地図を見せてきた。{/n}「なら、こうしない？隠れ家にたどり着くまでは、一緒にいるところを見られないほうが無難だから、あたしが先に現地に行く。誰にも目撃されないように、あたししか知らないルートで行くよ」

languages.text: “愿至高无上的神皇保佑你和你的子孙后裔！”{n}婕伊立刻拉出{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，将落脚港的地图推到你面前。{/n}“那就照我说的这么办。抵达安全屋之前，绝不能让别人看到我们在一起行动。我会抄小道先行一步，以免被人发现。”
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

traits.locale_text: “愿至高无上的神皇保佑你和你的子孙后裔！”{n}婕伊立刻拉出{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，将落脚港的地图推到你面前。{/n}“那就照我说的这么办。抵达安全屋之前，绝不能让别人我们在一起行动。我会抄小道先行一步，以免被人发现。”

languages.text: « Puisse l'Exalté vous bénir, votre progéniture et vous ! {n}Jae sort une {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g} et vous montre une carte de Castel.{/n} Alors, voici ce que nous allons faire. Il vaut peut-être mieux qu'on ne soit pas {mf|vus|vues} ensemble avant d'arriver à la planque. Je m'y rendrai la première en empruntant ma propre route afin de ne pas être repérée. »
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

traits.locale_text: « Puisse l'Exalté vous bénir, votre progéniture et vous ! {n}Jae sort une {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g} et vous montre une carte de Castel.{/n} Alors, voici ce que nous allons faire. Il vaut peut-être mieux qu'on ne soit pas {mf|vus|vues} ensemble avant d'arriver à la planque. Je m'y rendrai la première en empruntant ma propre route afin de ne pas être repérée. »

languages.text: «¡Que el Exaltado {mf|le|la} bendiga a usted y a su progenie!». {n}Jae saca al instante una {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} y te muestra un mapa de Paso.{/n} «Esto es lo que vamos a hacer. Lo mejor es que no nos vean juntos hasta que lleguemos al punto seguro. Yo iré primero; cogeré una ruta especial para que no me pillen».
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Exaltado {mf|le|la} bendiga a usted y a su progenie!». {n}Jae saca al instante una {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} y te muestra un mapa de Paso.{/n} «Esto es lo que vamos a hacer. Lo mejor es que no nos vean juntos hasta que lleguemos al punto seguro. Yo iré primero; cogeré una ruta especial para que no me pillen».

languages.text: "Möge der Erhabene Euch und Eure Nachkommen segnen!" {n}Jae zückt unversehens einen {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datenblock{/g} und zeigt dir eine Karte von Footfall.{/n} "Gut, dann machen wir es so. Wir sollten nicht zusammen gesehen werden, bevor wir im Versteck sind. Ich gehe zuerst. Niemand wird mich sehen, ich habe meine eigene Route."
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Erhabene Euch und Eure Nachkommen segnen!" {n}Jae zückt unversehens einen {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datenblock{/g} und zeigt dir eine Karte von Footfall.{/n} "Gut, dann machen wir es so. Wir sollten nicht zusammen gesehen haben, bevor wir im Versteck sind. Ich gehe zuerst. Niemand wird mich sehen, ich habe meine eigene Route."

languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a data-slate and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

languages.text: "Görkemli, seni ve soyunu kutsasın!" {n}Jae anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databela{/g} çıkarıp sana Binliman'ın haritasını gösteriyor.{/n} "Şöyle yapacağız. Saklandıkları yere gelmeden bizi birlikte görmemeliler. Oraya önce ben gideyim. Beni görmesinler diye özel güzergâhımı kullanırım."
languages.original_text: "May the Exalted One bless you and your progeny!" {n}Jae instantly pulls out a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} and shows you a map of Footfall.{/n} "Then here's what we'll do. We shouldn't be seen together before we make it to the safe house. I'll head there first. I'll take my own special route so I won't be spotted."

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli, seni ve soyunu kutsasın!" {n}Jae anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databela{/g} çıkarıp sana Binliman'ın bir haritasını gösteriyor.{/n} "İşte şöyle yapmak lazım. Saklandıkları yere gelmeden bizi birlikte görmemeliler. Oraya önce ben gideyim. Beni görmesinler diye özel bir yoldan geçerim."
